data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1 Dev Beta 4
data.actual_result: Button to close user profile is too far from top of screen
data.expected_result: Button to close user profile should be in same place as button to close user settings
data.short_description: [iPhone XS Max] Button to close user profile is too far from the top of the screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your user settings and observe the button to close - Go to a user profile and observe the positioning of the close button
